contentrichtext.text: {{For|a place in Greece|Gouves, Greece}} {{Infobox French commune |name = Gouves |image coat of arms = Blason Gouves.svg |region = [[Nord-Pas-de-Calais]] |department = [[Pas-de-Calais]] |arrondissement = Arras |canton = Beaumetz-lès-Loges |INSEE = 62378 |postal code = 62123 |mayor = Alain Philippe |term = 2008–2014 |intercommunality = Val de Gy |longitude = 2.6367 |latitude = 50.2989 |elevation m = 75 |elevation min m = 72 |elevation max m = 124 |area km2 = 2.64 |population = 198 |population date = 1999 }} '''Gouves''' is a [[Communes of France|commune]] in the [[Pas-de-Calais]] [[Departments in France|department]] in the [[Nord-Pas-de-Calais]] region of [[France]]. ==Geography== A farming village situated {{Convert|6|mi|km|1}} west of Arras, at the junction of the D56 and C5 roads, in the valley of the small river Gy. ==Population== {{Demography |1962 = 102 |1968 = 93 |1975 = 95 |1982 = 179 |1990 = 174 |1999 = 198 |withoutdoublecount = 1962 }} ==Places of interest== * The church (and the fountain) of St.Maclou, dating from the nineteenth century. * Traces of an old castle. ==See also== *[[Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department]] ==References== * [http://www.insee.fr/fr/methodes/nomenclatures/cog/fichecommunale.asp?codedep=62&codecom=378 INSEE commune file] {{Reflist}} ==External links== * [http://entente.gouvoise.free.fr Website of the “Entente Gouvoise”] {{Fr}} * [http://www.quid.fr/communes.html?mode=detail&id=26872&req=Gouves Gouves on the Quid website] {{Fr}} {{Pas-de-Calais communes}} [[Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais]] {{Arras-geo-stub}}
